title: How Apps4.Pro Planner handle user authentication with Office 365?
content: When user sign-in, the app redirects the user to Microsoft Sign-in page (https://login.microsoftonline.com/common), once the user completed the sign-in process, the app gets access token and use it for further communication between the app and Microsoft Planner.

title: Is Apps4.Pro Planner app available for free trial?
content: Yes, all Apps4.Pro Planner apps are available for 14 days free trial.  The download file is same for both Trial and Purchased version. After installation it will run in trial version and when you purchase a license it will be automatically converted to purchased version.

title: Can I try this app for my team?
content: Yes, you can. By default after installation, the trial will be enabled for single user. You need to contact sales@jijitechnologies.com to add additional users to your trial. Once done, you can manage their trial licenses from ‘Manage License’ link in the app.

title: How to configure inclusion list security for the add-in?
content: Go to the below Registry location : HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREMICROSOFT.NETFrameworkSecurity

title: What should I do incase, I receive Another object with the same value for property mailNickname already exists error during import?
content: The error message indicates that you already have an existing O365 group with same name (mail alias) that you trying to create now. So please try to create new group with different name or use Existing Group option and select the existing group.

title: Apps4pro Planner Manager Ce Features Available In Pm Extension
content: We have made several improvements to the app which are exclusive for chrome extension only.
